thread.title: Speck and Renowned Potter, Designer, and Author Jonathan Adler Release Collection of Protective Cases for New iPhone
thread.title_full: Speck and Renowned Potter, Designer, and Author Jonathan Adler Release Collection of Protective Cases for New iPhone

author: admin
title: Speck and Renowned Potter, Designer, and Author Jonathan Adler Release Collection of Protective Cases for New iPhone
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/30/2015 @ 9:53 AM   Speck 
NEW YORK and SAN MATEO, Calif., Sept. 30, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Speck, one of the world's best-selling smartphone case makers, announced today the release of its new Jonathan Adler x Speck collection of protective cases for iPhone 6s/6 and iPhone 6s Plus/6 Plus . The collection brings Jonathan Adler's iconic patterns and colors to life, and showcases the brand's spirit of Modern American Glamour - all without compromising on protection. 
https://photos.prnewswire.com/prnvar/20150930/272440 
Each designer iPhone case was inspired by Jonathan Adler's home d√©cor pieces, from his iconic pottery to his burled wood furniture. The cases are equipped with military-grade protection wrapped in Jonathan Adler's stunning hyper-realistic designs. 
"My phone is constantly in my hands - except when it's on the floor because I've dropped it. To create our new cases, I wanted to work with a company that cares about craftsmanship as much as I do. Speck is the perfect partner - they're even more obsessed with protecting my phone than I am," said Jonathan Adler. 
"Consumers shouldn't have to compromise on protection when they buy a designer case," said Speck's Vice President of Design Bryan Hynecek. "With the new Jonathan Adler by Speck collection, they don't have to." 
Jonathan Adler x Speck balances slim lines with military-grade protection in a designer case that's designed to make an impact - and take one. Like all CandyShell cases, it incorporates Speck's Seven Signs of Protection without Compromise: -- Military-grade protection -- Patented one-piece, multi-layer design -- Patented raised bezel screen protection -- Precision-engineered slim fit -- Perimeter port and camera protection -- Lab-tested durability -- Responsive button protection 
You can find Jonathan Adler x Speck iPhone 6s/6 cases ($49.95) and iPhone 6s Plus/6 Plus cases ($54.95) at speckproducts.com . Coming soon to jonathanadler.com and select retailers nationwide. 
About Jonathan Adler Jonathan Adler is dedicated to bringing Modern American Glamour to your life. There are more than 25 Jonathan Adler stores worldwide, a thriving e-commerce site, and a wholesale business boasting over 1,000 locations globally. His roots as an artist and sculptor continue to influence his brand of home accessories, which includes decorative objects, tabletop collections, bedding, bath accessories, candles, furniture, rugs, pillows, lighting and more. Adler is the author of the Happy Chic book series. He lives in New York City with his partner, Barneys New York Creative Ambassador Simon Doonan. 
About Speck Speck creates award-winning cases designed to make an impact - and take one. Since 2001, we've been making distinctive products for the world's top smartphones, tablets, laptops, watches, and backpacks. We deliver a balance of artful design and military-grade protection, for a difference you can see and feel. Our roots are in the heart of Silicon Valley, at the intersection of design and technology, inspiring us to craft masterfully engineered products. We believe that excellence is in the details, which is why we create cases that enable you to go more places and enjoy more from your mobile devices. Get to know us at speckproducts.com or follow us on Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, and Pinterest.
